page.title: 11Winter Sports (Curling)
page.content:
In winter, local people enjoy {curling}at the{Aviemore Ice Rink. Curling is a sport similar to Bowls played on ice and for all ages. If it is a very cold winter and temperatures stay below freezing for a long spell, curling can be played outside. Such an occasion is called a {BONSPIEL. On the{Grantown curling pond,}there can be several rinks, and on each there would be two teams of four players playing. There is a cup to be won and many people go to watch. Everybody loves a Bonspiel.
Costs :{Grantown Curling Club Senior Membership - Â£8.50 per year {Junior Membership - Â£2.00 per year Single Membership - Â£3.20 per year
